content.query:
CREATE TABLE dim.GradeLevel (
    GradeLevelKey nvarchar(100),
    GradeLevel nvarchar(100));

Insert Into dim.GradeLevel (GradeLevelKey, GradeLevel)

select [GradeLevel] as [GradeLevelKey],
	 CASE
		When [GradeLevel] In ('1st Grade', '01') THEN '1st'
		When [GradeLevel] In ('2nd Grade', '02') THEN '2nd'
		When [GradeLevel] In ('3rd Grade', '03') THEN '3rd'
		When [GradeLevel] In ('4th Grade', '04') THEN '4th'
		When [GradeLevel] In ('5th Grade', '05') THEN '5th'
		When [GradeLevel] In ('6th Grade', '06') THEN '6th'
		When [GradeLevel] In ('7th Grade', '07') THEN '7th'
		When [GradeLevel] In ('8th Grade', '08') THEN '8th'
		When [GradeLevel] In ('9th Grade', '09') THEN '9th'
		When [GradeLevel] In ('10th Grade', '10') THEN '10th'
		When [GradeLevel] In ('11th Grade', '11') THEN '11th'
		When [GradeLevel] In ('12th Grade', '12') THEN '12th'
		when [GradeLevel] in ('AllGrades', 'All Grades') THEN 'All Grades'
		when [GradeLevel] in ('Kindergarten', 'Half-day Kindergarten', 'KG') THEN 'K'
		when [GradeLevel] in ('Preschool', 'Pre-Kindergarten') THEN 'PK'
		Else [GradeLevel] 
		End as [GradeLevel]
from
(
Select [GradeLevel]
from [staging].[AcademicPerformance] 
Union
select [GradeLevel]
from [staging].[Enrollment]
Union
select [GradeLevel]
from [staging].[SGP]
) as srk
Group by [GradeLevel]


select *
from dim.Gradelevel
